body:
The "`Pod Disks should schedule a pod w/ a readonly PD on two hosts, then remove both`" E2E test will sometimes fail because it fails to delete the PD used in the test after the test is finished.

The error:

```
/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:187
Error deleting PD
Expected error:
    <*exec.ExitError | 0xc208035ea8>: {
        ProcessState: {
            pid: 10524,
            status: 256,
            rusage: {
                Utime: {Sec: 0, Usec: 428000},
                Stime: {Sec: 0, Usec: 48000},
                Maxrss: 39024,
                Ixrss: 0,
                Idrss: 0,
                Isrss: 0,
                Minflt: 19580,
                Majflt: 0,
                Nswap: 0,
                Inblock: 0,
                Oublock: 32,
                Msgsnd: 0,
                Msgrcv: 0,
                Nsignals: 0,
                Nvcsw: 62,
                Nivcsw: 27,
            },
        },
    }
    exit status 1
not to have occurred
```

Detailed test log:

```
===================================
Random Seed: 1434502630 - Will randomize all specs
Will run 2 of 86 specs

SSSSSSS
------------------------------
Pod Disks 
  should schedule a pod w/ a readonly PD on two hosts, then remove both.
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:187
[BeforeEach] Pod Disks
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:63
>>> testContext.KubeConfig: /usr/local/google/home/saadali/.kube/config
[It] should schedule a pod w/ a readonly PD on two hosts, then remove both.
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:187
STEP: creating PD
STEP: submitting rwPod to ensure PD is formatted
INFO: Waiting up to 5m0s for pod pd-test-ce826684-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            status to be running
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce826684-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (40.185418ms elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce826684-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (5.080065636s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce826684-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (10.120245467s elapsed)
STEP: submitting host0ROPod to kubernetes
STEP: submitting host1ROPod to kubernetes
INFO: Waiting up to 5m0s for pod pd-test-ce82688d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            status to be running

INFO: Waiting up to 5m0s for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            status to be running
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (40.657896ms elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (5.081138448s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (10.124147413s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (15.16559385s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (20.205778834s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (25.246490617s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (30.28698796s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (35.327289576s elapsed)
INFO: Waiting for pod pd-test-ce82693d-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1            in namespace 'default' status to be 'running'(found phase: "Pending", readiness: false) (40.371424117s elapsed)
STEP: deleting host0ROPod
STEP: deleting host1ROPod
STEP: deleting PD "e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1"
INFO: Couldn't delete PD. Sleeping 5 seconds
INFO: Couldn't delete PD. Sleeping 5 seconds

• Failure [255.246 seconds]
Pod Disks
/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:188
  should schedule a pod w/ a readonly PD on two hosts, then remove both. [It]
  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:187

  Error deleting PD
  Expected error:
      <*exec.ExitError | 0xc208036b40>: {
          ProcessState: {
              pid: 12383,
              status: 256,
              rusage: {
                  Utime: {Sec: 0, Usec: 250389},
                  Stime: {Sec: 0, Usec: 52537},
                  Maxrss: 35048,
                  Ixrss: 0,
                  Idrss: 0,
                  Isrss: 0,
                  Minflt: 22735,
                  Majflt: 0,
                  Nswap: 0,
                  Inblock: 0,
                  Oublock: 32,
                  Msgsnd: 0,
                  Msgrcv: 0,
                  Nsignals: 0,
                  Nvcsw: 64,
                  Nivcsw: 58,
              },
          },
      }
      exit status 1
  not to have occurred

  /go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/github.com/GoogleCloudPlatform/kubernetes/test/e2e/pd.go:186
```

The disk that fails to delete still shows up in `/dev/disk/by-id/`:

```
root@e2e-test-saadali-minion-0knj:/home/saadali# ls /dev/disk/by-id/
google-e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1  scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1
google-persistent-disk-0                         scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_persistent-disk-0
google-persistent-disk-0-part1                   scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_persistent-disk-0-part1
```

My attempts to manually try to delete the PD fail with:

```
gcloud -q compute --project=saads-vms2 disks delete --zone=us-central1-b e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1
ERROR: (gcloud.compute.disks.delete) Some requests did not succeed:
 - The disk resource 'e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1' is already being used by 'e2e-test-saadali-minion-0knj'
```

`udevadm trigger` (the work around for #7972) doesn't change anything here:

```
root@e2e-test-saadali-minion-0knj:/home/saadali# udevadm trigger
root@e2e-test-saadali-minion-0knj:/home/saadali# ls /dev/disk/by-id/
google-e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1  scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_e2e-cc09ef6a-148b-11e5-8fe7-f0921cde18c1
google-persistent-disk-0                         scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_persistent-disk-0
google-persistent-disk-0-part1                   scsi-0Google_PersistentDisk_persistent-disk-0-part1
```

milestone.description: Issues that need to be resolved for v1.0 of Kubernetes.
milestone.title: v1.0

title: Persistent Disk mount test sometimes fails to delete disk
